House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00009
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A DRUG REHABILITATION CENTER IN EVERY REGION AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Provides for the establishment of a drug rehabilitation center in every region in the country so that the drug dependents will have a greater opportunity for rehabilitation and eventual reintegration to the community.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : FARIÑAS, RODOLFO C., ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D., ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G., DUAVIT, JOHN MICHAEL R., COJUANGCO, CARLOS O., KHO, ELISA "OLGA" T., ABU, RANEO "RANIE" E., SALIMBANGON, BENHUR L., NOGRALES, KARLO ALEXEI B., SUAREZ, DANILO E., BATOCABE, RODEL M.
